description:
Fiery pepper flakes for the pasta or a dash of cinnamon for your morning coffee. Elevate all your camp cuisine with your own favourite seasonings.

  • Made of co-polyester with a polypropylene lid
  • Carries 6 spices
  • Waterproof caps and chambers screw together to keeps spices flavourful and dry
  • Single- sided screens twist into position and remove easy for cleaning
  • Filler cap stores under the base for easy refilling of any compartment
name: GSI Spice Rocket
